sql.insert_pptn_sql: insert into ST_PPTN_R (STCD, TM, DRP, INTV) values (:f1<char[9]>, :f2<timestamp>, :f3<float>, :f4<float>)  ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STCD = STCD;
sql.insert_stbprp_sql: INSERT INTO ST_STBPRP_B (STCD, STNM, RVNM, HNNM, BSNM, LGTD, LTTD, STLC, ADDVCD, DTMNM, DTMEL, DTPR, STTP, FRGRD, ESSTYM, BGFRYM, ATCUNIT, ADMAUTH, LOCALITY, STBK, STAZT, DSTRVM, DRNA, PHCD, USFL, COMMENTS, MODITIME, HNNM0, ADCD, ADDVCD1) VALUES (:f1<char[9]>, :f2<char[30]>, :f3<char[50]>, :f4<char[30]>, :f5<char[30]>, :f6<float>, :f7<float>, :f8<char[80]>, :f9<char[7]>, :f10<char[30]>, :f11<float>, :f12<float>, :f13<char[4]>, :f14<char[2]>, :f15<char[7]>, :f16<char[7]>, :f17<char[40]>, :f18<char[40]>, :f19<char[20]>, :f20<char[2]>, :f21<int>, :f22<float>, :f23<int>, :f24<char[10]>, :f25<char[2]>,:f26<char[200]>, :f27<timestamp>, :f28<char[30]>, :f29<char[30]>, :f30<char[7]>)  ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE STCD = STCD;
